name: agentic-primitives
description: Production-grade plugins for Claude Code agents — SDLC, workspace observability, research tools, documentation, and meta-generators

plugins.name: sdlc
plugins.description: Software Development Lifecycle — commit, review, QA, testing, security hooks, git hooks, and infrastructure configuration

plugins.name: workspace
plugins.description: Observable isolated workspaces — lifecycle and observability hooks emitting structured JSONL events

plugins.name: research
plugins.description: Information gathering — web scraping, documentation extraction, and research tools

plugins.name: meta
plugins.description: Primitive generators — tools that create commands, skills, prompts, and other agentic primitives

plugins.name: docs
plugins.description: Documentation tools — Fumadocs integration and documentation management
